quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.text: So many books, so little time.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.text: Reading is essential for those who seek to rise above the ordinary.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Once you learn to read, you will be forever free.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.text: I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library.
quotes.author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.text: Books are a uniquely portable magic.
quotes.author: Stephen King
